column5: What a beautiful read, thanks for sharing it!

Thanks for the great report Chris, looks like you guys had another great trip! I know what you mean about the bugs, we were up at Windermere last week and in 30 odd years I have never seen the black flies that bad! Will be picking at the scabs in my scalp for weeks!  Kris
Thanks for sharing. Those reports are always enjoyable and inspiring reads. So how big was Dman's brute?
The fish I stole off Brad was taped, it was 41". D Man's fish was in a different league, significantly larger.  CP 24 is running a story on D Man's pike.
I've been to Napken twice. Great place to fish!
Misleading title, you might have also called it, Remains of Franklin's lost crew found on Pike trip to Napken Lake, on the James Bay Lowlands, report LOL
Beauty report. One of you should pack a fly rod on your next trip. 40+ incher on a fly rod would be wild.
Great shooting guys!!!!  Bet it was a blast!  I should probably give ya a shout and catch up Brock, it's been awhile!  Looks like all is well though!!!

The fish I stole off Brad was taped, it was 41". D Man's fish was in a different league, significantly larger.  CP 24 is running a story on D Man's pike.   The one I tried to steal back was also considerably larger, ooh for one more crack.  I'm not sure the exact size of Adam's fish but I can say it barely fit in the cradle.  Think I've seen that guy on TV before, either way he looks pleased to have met you,
Awesome Chris!  I know Mike has talked about Napken for quite some time.
Thanks for sharing the report Chris , looks like good times
thanks for posting this chris. I got a sense of how bad the bugs were by watching those bloody videos and hearing the terrible mosquito wines that drive me nuts some nights.  Monster fish indeed.
